critique: The president is conveying a sense of concern and determination to improve safety and reduce costs associated with auto accidents. The document uses language that highlights the severity of the issue (thousands of lives, needless deaths, $32 billion cost) and emphasizes the positive impact of the proposed policy (reduce human pain and suffering, set an example, reduce burden on taxpayers). There's a sense of responsibility and resolve in the order.The president is not conveying joy, surprise, disgust, fear, or sadness.
